com.zifang.demo.algrithm.inheritance.chapter3

类 Robot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zifang.demo.algrithm.inheritance.chapter3.Robot

  • public class Robot
extends java.lang.Object
    A robot abstraction. Give it a maze and an instruction set, and it will attempt to navigate to the finish.
    作者:
    bkanber

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Robot(int[] sensorActions, Maze maze, int maxMoves)
      Initalize a robot with controller

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getNextAction()
      Get next action depending on sensor mapping
      int[] getPosition()
      Get robot's position
      java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getRoute()
      Returns robot's complete route around the maze
      int getSensorValue()
      Get sensor value
      void makeNextAction()
      Runs the next action
      java.lang.String printRoute()
      Returns route in printable format
      void run()
      Runs the robot's actions based on sensor inputs

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Robot

        public Robot(int[] sensorActions,
             Maze maze,
             int maxMoves)
        Initalize a robot with controller
        参数:
        sensorActions - The string to map the sensor value to actions
        maze - The maze the robot will use
        maxMoves - The maximum number of moves the robot can make

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Runs the robot's actions based on sensor inputs

      • makeNextAction

        public void makeNextAction()
        Runs the next action

      • getNextAction

        public int getNextAction()
        Get next action depending on sensor mapping
        返回:
        int Next action

      • getSensorValue

        public int getSensorValue()
        Get sensor value
        返回:
        int Next sensor value

      • getPosition

        public int[] getPosition()
        Get robot's position
        返回:
        int[] Array with robot's position

      • getRoute

        public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getRoute()
        Returns robot's complete route around the maze
        返回:
        ArrayList Robot's route

      • printRoute

        public java.lang.String printRoute()
        Returns route in printable format
        返回:
        String Robot's route
